results.overview: The story follows Carol Danvers as she becomes one of the universe’s most powerful heroes when Earth is caught in the middle of a galactic war between two alien races. Set in the 1990s, Captain Marvel is an all-new adventure from a previously unseen period in the history of the Marvel Cinematic Universe.
results.title: Captain Marvel

results.overview: The film takes place one year after the events of Captain America: The First Avenger, in which Agent Carter, a member of the Strategic Scientific Reserve, is in search of the mysterious Zodiac.
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: Agent Carter

results.overview: An exciting look into the future of Marvel Studios' films and upcoming Disney+ series.
results.title: Marvel Studios: Expanding the Universe

results.overview: Agent Coulson informs Agent Sitwell that the World Security Council wishes Emil Blonsky to be released from prison to join the Avengers Initiative. As Nick Fury doesn't want to release Blonsky, the two agents decide to send a patsy to sabotage the meeting...
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: The Consultant

results.overview: You are thousands of years old. You have amazing powers. You have watched civilizations rise and fall. So why does no one remember any of this? Best-selling author, Neil Gaiman (Marvel: 1602) is joined by superstar artist, John Romita. Jr. (Amazing Spider-Man), to bring you the extraordinary tale of The Eternals. Medical student Mark Curry's world is turned upside-down when he meets Ike Harris, a man who believes that he is part of a centuries-old race of super-powered beings put here on Earth by aliens to preserve and safeguard the planet — and even crazier, tried to convince Mark that he is one too.
results.title: Marvel Knights: Eternals

results.overview: Benny and Claire, a down on their luck couple find a discarded Chitauri gun, referred to as 'Item 47'...
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: Item 47

results.overview: A look at the story behind Marvel Studios and the Marvel Cinematic Universe, featuring interviews and behind-the-scenes footage from all of the Marvel films, the Marvel One-Shots and "Marvel's Agents of S.H.I.E.L.D."
results.title: Marvel Studios: Assembling a Universe

results.overview: Phineas and Ferb team up with the Avengers to save the world from Dr. Doofenshmirtz and a group of dangerous supervillains.
results.title: Phineas and Ferb: Mission Marvel

results.overview: When a threat no one could have expected bears down on the Marvel Universe, this ragtag, untrained band of teens have no choice but to rise together and prove to the world that sometimes the difference between a 'hero' and 'misfit' is just in the name.
results.title: Marvel Rising: Secret Warriors

results.original_title: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King
results.overview: A documentary filmmaker interviews the now-famous Trevor Slattery from behind bars.
results.title: Marvel One-Shot: All Hail the King

results.original_title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled!
results.overview: The Avengers are forced to “party” with Ultron when he seeks to disassemble the team by taking control of Iron Man’s armor and enact a nefarious scheme to take over the world.
results.title: LEGO Marvel Super Heroes: Avengers Reassembled!

results.original_title: Marvel Studios: Assembled – The Making of Moon Knight
results.overview: Join the likes of Oscar Isaac and Ethan Hawke as they reveal how Marvel Studios' Moon Knight was painstakingly brought to life. Through insightful interviews with cast and crew, along with immersive footage from the set, this Making Of pulls back the curtain on this groundbreaking series. Additionally, incorporates a candid "roundtable discussion" with the series' directors.
results.title: Marvel Studios: Assembled – The Making of Moon Knight

results.overview: Ironheart, AKA Riri Williams, is having difficulty adjusting to college life as the youngest student there when the college's engineering lab is demolished by an alien and her best friend is kidnapped. Inspired by Iron Man, she develops a plan to save her friend.
results.title: Marvel Rising: Heart of Iron

results.original_title: LEGO Marvel Spider-Man: Vexed by Venom
results.overview: Thanks to Green Goblin and Venom, tech theft is now at an all-time high. Can our Friendly Neighborhood Spider-Man put an end to their mysterious villainous scheme before all of New York City is destroyed?
results.title: LEGO Marvel Spider-Man: Vexed by Venom

results.original_title: Marvel Super Hero Adventures: Frost Fight!
results.overview: The holiday season gets extra chilly as Loki and the frost giant Ymir plot to conquer the world. Marvel heroes Iron Man, Captain America, Hulk, Thor and others must stop the villains from stealing Santa's power – if anyone can actually find the mysterious Mr. Claus. Fortunately, Rocket Raccoon and Groot are also hot on Santa's trail. Heroes, villains, elves and cosmic bounty hunters collide in an epic quest that leaves the fate of the holiday and the world in the balance.
results.title: Marvel Super Hero Adventures: Frost Fight!

results.overview: Explore the Disney+ series of the MCU—past, present and future.
results.title: Marvel Studios' 2021 Disney+ Day Special

results.overview: Hot on the trails of Sheath and Exile, Ghost-Spider teams up with the rest of the Secret Warriors to bring down the villains for good.
results.title: Marvel Rising: Chasing Ghosts

results.overview: When Thanos steals the quantum tunnel, the Avengers embark on a mission to stop him from changing history.
results.title: LEGO Marvel Avengers: Time Twisted

results.overview: Documentary about the rise of Marvel Studios after their near-bankruptcy in the mid-1990s.
results.title: Marvel Renaissance

results.overview: Marvel Stories
results.title: Marvel Stories
